反攻上陸作戦「トーチ作戦」\nに参加するため、遠征艦隊を\n西方に派遣する！同進: Send an expeditionary fleet westwards to take part in Operation Torch, a counter-offensive landing operation! Conduct frontline sweeping on the same route!
アラビア海/アデン湾/紅海: Arabian Sea / Gulf of Aden / Red Sea
海上輸送によって航空基地を\n前進し、艦隊主力を展開して\nアデン湾周辺の安全を: Advance air bases by sea transport, deploy main fleet forces and secure the area around the Gulf of Aden! Advance to the Suez Canal!
スエズ運河を抜けて、地中海\n方面へ進出！基地航空隊と連\n携し、アレクサンドリ: Advance through the Suez Canal and into the Mediterranean! In coordination with the base air force, advance from Alexandria and break through the Mediterranean!
対空、対潜警戒を厳にせよ！:
Maintain strict anti-aircraft and
anti-submarine precautions!
遠征艦隊の前路掃討を実施する！抜錨！:
Conduct frontline sweeping for
the expeditionary fleet! Weigh anchor!
遠征艦隊、アデン湾方面へ進出せよ！:
Expeditionary fleet, advance towards
the Gulf of Aden!
スエズ運河を越え、地中海に進出せよ！:
Cross the Suez Canal and
enter the Mediterranean!
敵機動部隊、接近中！警戒を厳にせよ！:
Enemy task force approaching!
Maintain high vigilance!
